seniority_level.evidence: Required 1-5 years of professional software development experience and no seniority indicator in title.

job_family.evidence: Title includes "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, integrations, and dashboards.

sub_specialty.evidence: Job description emphasizes Palantir Foundry pipelines and ontology objects without specific streaming, batch, or warehouse focus.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, people management, or technical lead responsibilities; collaboration only.

primary_cloud.evidence: The posting does not reference any cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) or on‑premise infrastructure.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud providers are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Neither streaming nor batch processing technologies are explicitly cited.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tool (Airflow, dbt, etc.) is referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: The description does not specify data warehouses, lakes, or lakehouse technologies.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is listed as Berthoud, CO and work model is "onsite"; therefore candidates must be in the United States.

timezone_focus.evidence: Only U.S. citizenship or permanent residency is required; no timezone or regional preference beyond the U.S. is stated.

relocation_required.evidence: The posting does not mention a relocation package or requirement to move.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not offered; the posting states "must_be_authorized" for work.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization is required and no mention of OPT/CPT eligibility is made.

citizenship_required.evidence: Explicit text: "US Citizenship or Permanent Residency".

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is "full_time" and contract type is "permanent", indicating a standard employee (W‑2) arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits list includes unlimited PTO, parental leave, medical/dental/vision, 401(k) options, equity grants, and many supplemental perks.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The description mentions "growth" of the company but provides no specific career tracks or promotion ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with a Product Owner and other engineers is noted, implying learning from more experienced teammates.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions, ladders, or advancement opportunities appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not reference internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track (IC, management, specialist, architect) is described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A clear set of must‑have hard skills is listed alongside a short nice‑to‑have list, indicating balanced strictness.

scope_definition.evidence: The role is specifically defined as a Software & Data Engineer working on Palantir Foundry, without overlapping responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required experience (1‑5 years) aligns with the listed technical skills; expectations are realistic for the seniority level.
